alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 2:20PM EDT until August 13 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Nantucket County in southeastern Massachusetts... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 219 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Nantucket, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nantucket. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
